select
from t_manager order by create_time desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into t_manager (id, phone, pwd, identity, name, birth, sex, image, create_time, modify_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
